title: Mom's collard greens
directions: Put ham hocks in the pot with the water and broth and let it steam.
While it is steaming, wash collards, remove stems and cut up an onion.
Put everything in the pot along with seasoning and continue to steam.
Collard greens are not ready for several hours...dark green in color
ingredients: 1 pack of Uncle Wiley's green seasoning
1/2 pot of water and chicken broth
